mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID AS memberId, MEMBER_PWD AS memberPwd, MEMBER_NAME AS memberName, EMAIL AS email, PHONE AS phone, BIRTH AS birth, ADDRESS AS address, STATUS AS status, P_IMG AS pImg FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MEMBER_PWD = #{memberPwd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, BIRTH, ADDRESS) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{memberPwd}, #{memberName}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birth}, #{address})
